tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (NN world)) (VP (MD could) (VP (VP (VB be) (VP (VBG ending))) (, ,) (CC and) (ADVP (RB ill)) (VP (ADVP (RB still)) (VB smile) (PP (IN from) (NP (NN ear))) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN ear))))))))
